frontMatter.title: Functional Programming Java functional techniques
frontMatter.summary: 这两天翻了这本书，基于java讲FP的，把关键的概念讲的很清楚，很多动手的练习帮助理解，值得看看 https://www.amazon.com/Functional-Programming-Java-functional-techniques/dp/1617292737
